The experts at ClinLab Staffing can help you achieve a fast, positive impact on your R&D, process development, quality and operational results.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_2_font=”||on||||||” header_2_text_color=”#ae4542″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||||false|false”]

Whether you need contractors or full-time hires, ClinLab Staffing delivers.[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”#777e84″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|300||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”31px” text_line_height=”1em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”18px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”1.4em” text_line_height_phone=”1.9em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet”]Some Life Sciences Professional Positions We Place:[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”58px||58px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||101px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||72px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5,1_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

  • Molecular Biologist

  • Quality Compliance

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

  • Process Development
  • Manufacturing

  • Engineering

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

  • Formulations
  • Clinical Operations
  • Biostatistician

  • Clinical Research Associate
  • Quality Compliance
  • Process Development
  • Manufacturing
  • Operations
  • Product Development

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

  • Quality Assurance

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ width=”100%” max_width=”2560px” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/lab-needle.jpeg” custom_css_main_element=”min-height: 57vw !important;||display: block !important;” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#e9edee”][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”34px|88px|0px|88px|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|36px||36px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#e9edee” custom_padding__hover_enabled=”off|desktop”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”19px” text_line_height=”1.1em” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”22px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet”]When you need the best scientific talent and you need it now, contact us![/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”22px||0px||false|false” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet”]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
You need the industry’s best talent – and you need it now. The experts at ClinLab Staffing will partner with you for an immediate positive impact on your R&D, process development, quality and operational results.

  • Work with specialized experts – who know your environment: Every one of our account managers has a proven track record in scientific recruiting. You’ll work one-on-one with your senior-level partner throughout the process.

    Learn more about our Life Sciences Recruitment & Staffing services >>

  • Connect with top talent – faster: Shorten your time to hire. Complete initiatives on time, on budget and on point. Our database offers more than 150,000 top candidates and our turnaround time is an industry-leading 48 hours for exclusive requirements.
  • Get better results – every time: Proven sourcing strategies and a highly successful fill ratio help you conduct every step from research up to clinical trials. Whether you need contractors or full-time hires, ClinLab Staffing delivers.

Maximize your ROI – and build a stronger scientific team – by contacting us today. We’ll put you first.

Life Sciences Professionals

Below is a sample of some of the professionals we place:

  • Laboratory Technician
  • Research Associate
  • Scientist
  • Principal Scientist
  • QA/QC Specialists
  • Document Control Specialist
  • Process Development Scientist
  • Manufacturing Specialist
  • Manufacturing Engineer
  • Lab Manager
  • Supervisor, Manager, and Director Level Candidates
  • Clinical Trial Managers
  • Clinical Research Associates
  • Clinical Data Managers
  • SAS Programmers
  • Biostatisticians
  • Medical Writer
  • Regulatory Affairs
